B C D G H I M P S T V W 

B

Ball - Class in <Unnamed>
The Ball class describes the ball that starts in the center of the screen and intereacts with the paddles and boundaries of the screen.
Ball(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Ball
The Ball constructor sets the initial x and y values of the ball.
bounceX() - Method in class Ball
Flips the sign of the xVel field which changes the ball's horizontal direction.
bounceY() - Method in class Ball
Flips the sign of the yVel field which changes the ball's vertical direction.

C

checkBounds() - Method in class Ball
Checks that the ball's xPos and yPos are within the xBounds and yBounds set by the constructor and calls the appropriate bounce method.
checkHorPaddleCollision(HorPaddle) - Method in class Ball
This method checks collision with the passed HorPaddle object.
checkVerPaddleCollision(VerPaddle) - Method in class Ball
This method check collision with the passed VerPaddle object.

D

DIAMETER - Static variable in class Ball
 
draw(Graphics) - Method in class Ball
The draw method to handle drawing a Ball to a JFrame.
draw(Graphics) - Method in class HorPaddle
The HorPaddle's draw method to handle rendering it to the screen.
draw(Graphics) - Method in class VerPaddle
The VerPaddle's draw method to handle rendering it to the screen.
Driver - Class in <Unnamed>
The class that drives the pong program.
Driver() - Constructor for class Driver
 

G

GAME_HEIGHT - Static variable in class GamePanel
 
GAME_NAME - Static variable in class GamePanel
 
GAME_WIDTH - Static variable in class GamePanel
 
GamePanel - Class in <Unnamed>
The GamePanel class represents the JPanel that holds the game itself.
GamePanel() - Constructor for class GamePanel
Initializes the JPanel.
getBounceCount() - Method in class Ball
Accessor method for the bounceCount field;
getXPos() - Method in class Ball
Accessor method for the xPos field.
getXPos() - Method in class Paddle
Accessor method for the xPos field.
getYPos() - Method in class Ball
Accessor method for the yPos field.
getYPos() - Method in class Paddle
Accessor method for the yPos field.
go() - Method in class GamePanel
The game loop which updates all the paddles and balls: check's collision, moves the ball, etc.

H

HEIGHT - Static variable in class HorPaddle
 
HEIGHT - Static variable in class VerPaddle
 
HorPaddle - Class in <Unnamed>
The HorPaddle class describes the Horizontal Paddles on the top and bottom of the screen.
HorPaddle(int, int) - Constructor for class HorPaddle
The HorPaddle constructer that sends it's paramaters to the abstract Paddle class' constructor.

I

incrementXPos(int) - Method in class Paddle
Mutator method that increments the xPos field by amt.
incrementYPos(int) - Method in class Paddle
Mutator method that increments the yPos field by amt.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Driver
The entry point for the program.
move() - Method in class Ball
Updates the position of the ball by adding the xVel to the xPos and yVel to the yPos.
moveDown() - Method in class VerPaddle
The moveDown method calls the incrementYPos method from the super class and uses the Paddle.SPEED value to increment yPos by.
moveLeft() - Method in class HorPaddle
The moveLeft method calls the incrementXPos method from the super class and uses the negative Paddle.SPEED value to increment xPos by.
moveRight() - Method in class HorPaddle
The moveRight method calls the incrementXPos method from the super class and uses the Paddle.SPEED value to increment xPos by.
moveUp() - Method in class VerPaddle
The moveUp method calls the incrementYPos method from the super class and uses the negative Paddle.SPEED value to increment yPos by.

P

Paddle - Class in <Unnamed>
The Paddle class holds all common variables that the VerPaddle and HorPaddle share.
Paddle(int, int) - Constructor for class Paddle
The Paddle constructor sets the xPos and yPos variables.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class GamePanel
The paint method that gets called every tick.

S

SPACING - Static variable in class Paddle
 
SPEED - Static variable in class Ball
 
SPEED - Static variable in class Paddle
 

T

THICKNESS - Static variable in class Paddle
 

V

VerPaddle - Class in <Unnamed>
The HorPaddle class describes the Vertival Paddles on the right and left of the screen.
VerPaddle(int, int) - Constructor for class VerPaddle
The VerPaddle constructer that sends it's paramaters to the abstract Paddle class' constructor.

W

WIDTH - Static variable in class HorPaddle
 
WIDTH - Static variable in class VerPaddle
